thread.title: Barneys Aims to Reinvent Luxury Marketing for Younger Shoppers

author: Christina Binkley
title: Barneys Aims to Reinvent Luxury Marketing for Younger Shoppers

organizations.name: barneys aims to reinvent luxury marketing for younger

text:
Daniella Vitale stepped into her role as chief executive of Barneys New York in early 2017 as a slew of headlines reported falling store revenues at retailers nationwide and shifting consumption patterns.
Barneys felt the pain at its stores. The privately held retailer of high-end clothing and other luxury goods doesnâ€™t report revenue, but Ms. Vitale says its stores were suffering along with those of other retailers.
